Package org.hypermedea.op.http

Class HttpResponse

java.lang.Object
org.hypermedea.op.BaseResponse
org.hypermedea.op.http.HttpResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Response
public class HttpResponse extends BaseResponse
Wrapper for an HTTP response received when performing a HttpOperation. The payload of the response is deserialized based on a DataSchema from a given ThingDescription.

    • getPayload

      public Collection<jason.asSyntax.Literal> getPayload()
      Description copied from interface: Response
      Note: not only for GET/WATCH. If e.g. POST with creation of resource: this method should return the exposed link to new resource as a Jason term.
      Returns:
      a collection of Jason terms representing the response's payload.
